quote: The sun had now set the sky ablaze with glorious hues of orange. She squinted to focus in the brilliance and thoughts of distant fire breathing dragons lit up her imagination once again.
quote_letters: THE SUN HAD NOW SET THE SKY ABLAZE WITH GLORIOUS HUES OF ORANGE SHE SQUINTED TO FOCUS IN THE BRILLIANCE AND THOUGHTS OF DISTANT FIRE BREATHING DRAGONS LIT UP HER IMAGINATION ONCE AGAIN
